law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 5, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 321, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1984.
